vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
φῆστος, -ου, ὁ
(Porcius), Festus, procurator of Judæa: Act.24:27 25:1 ff. Act.26:24-25, 32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.24.27; also called Porcius at Act.24.27;
§ Festus, "festal, joyful"
Festus, (Proper name), Acts 24:27; 25:1, 4, 12ff., 22ff.; 26:24f., 32*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Festo (sucesor de Félix como procurador de Palestina)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
[波求] 非斯都 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在拉丁文的意思是 "節期, 慶祝"
接續腓力斯的猶大巡撫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
[波求] 非斯都 这个阳性专有名词 人名在拉丁文的意思是 "节期, 庆祝"
接续腓力斯的犹大巡抚
